Comment: Is the "glomerulus" referenced in the axon specific field referencing a generic glomerulus or the "antennal lobe glomerulus"?  Right now
Antennal lobe (Honey bee) interneuron.Definition: Interglomerular local interneurons in the antennal lobe of the honey bee, Apis mellifera. Homoglomerular and heteroglomerular innervation patterns. Total of 4000 neurons, about two third GABA immunoreactive. Other transmitters possibly histamine and glutamate.
